programs.title: Integrated Financial Services
contents: The Joseph Center works with individual clients who receive SSI/SSDI, VA, and private benefits with monthly financial management and disbursement.
services: Annual written report of how the payments were used
Help beneficiary complete forms for continued disability reviews, court reports, and RZ (redetermination) of SSI eligibility/VA benefits
Report and changes that might affect their eligibility (i.e. death or marriage)
Meet with client regularly to create a budget
Involve the client as much as possible
Help find benefits and services (food stamps, housing, subsidies)
Help clients fill out applications for other services
programs.goal: The Joseph Center Integrated Financial Services program will set up direct deposit for receipt for clients benefits. This eliminates risk of theft, and ensures that money checks are immediately available.
